text:
D. Saranya (19), a first year BSc student of Bharathidasan University, and A. Flora Arokiamary (15), who was in class X, drowned in a tank at Karunkulam near Vaiyampatti on Sunday.

T. Maria Pushpam (16) and A. Jone Amalraj (12), brother of Flora Arokiamary, who also ventured into the waterbody to take bath, were rescued. – Special Correspondent
title: Two girls drown
